title: First Day of Free Agency with Kevin Pelton
description:
Zach and ESPN's Kevin Pelton discuss a wild day in the NBA: Kevin Durant's trade request, where Kyrie Irving ends up, the Hawks/Spurs trade, Philly's offseason, Wolves, Wiz, Nuggets, Karl-Anthony Towns, Lakers signings, much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Zach Lowe
